name: Dirty Blood (itch) (Alex de Oliveira)
description:
"Caster are not welcome in this society, imagine born as Dark Caster? What defines your character? genetics or actions?  "

This project prototype was done by 3 Designers me (Alex de Oliveira), Andrew Spinks and James Porley.  It is a narrative game prototype made for a,  Writer "client" that requested a prototype of a reimagined version of his short story. 

My contributions to this project were:

  • Level Design
  • Art 
  • Asset flipping and creation
  • User experience 
  • FX
  • Game design ( Contribution )  
  • Character Controller
  • Animation
  • UI
